comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: Phew! Took me a while to find this - at the junction of Abercrombie Street and Cleveland Street. GoogleMapsStreetView - goo.gl/maps/fQtwz See also this map at original size for the tram routes - [http://www.flickr.com/photos/state-records-nsw/6662642331/]

comment.author: 96951910@N00
comment._content: Walk/run/cycle this junction most days - great to see it so familiar from a previous era!

comment._content: Lanfranchi's alley on the right.  I am not quite convinced,  isn't Cleveland St between Abercrombie and City Road running down and up ?  This looks too flat.
